message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it. This is the highest I can go at this point. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10,500. This is my final offer in this range.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit more than I can afford. I'm willing to go up to $9,000 for the product. This is my final offer. If it doesn't work for you, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand you're close to your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $10,000. This is my last offer.
